channel.title: Need Help With Custom shields please
channel.description: i need help with a custom item i made its zilyana's shield ive made the models added them to my server but when i equip the item it doesnt goto my shield slot but my weapon slot please help when i used datmaker i saved it as left hand animation and priority 10 i have a gut feeling that its the priority level or something also the ints i used is the same as another shield that works properly please help

item.title: Need Help With Custom shields please
item.dc:creator: @matthewboi12 matthewboi12
item.description:
@matthewboi12 wrote:

ok i found why it apears wonrg… at the bottom left of screeen u can chose… left hand, head, right hand … ect … change it to what hand u want… if u need the version i have let me know … good luck!, add me on msn… redcrime@hotmail.com so i can give u instant help…

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With Custom shields please
item.dc:creator: @grundyboy34 grundyboy34
item.description:
@grundyboy34 wrote:

i converted it to .mqo file with dat maker
went in to metaseq and stretched it a bit and moved around to fit the 317 male model
then deleted him and saved
then went to datmaker and converted back to .dat file then gzipped cut and pasted into client models and added ints
went on client added models then compiled and restarted
and it was there but as a weapon
